text:
Rosalind Chao (born September 23, 1967) is an American actress.
Chao's best-known roles have been Soon-Lee Klinger in the mid-1980s CBS show "AfterMASH", Rose Hsu Jordan in the 1993 movie "The Joy Luck Club", Keiko O'Brien on ' and ' in the 1990s, and Dr. Kim on "The O.C." in 2003.
For some time, Chao worked at Disneyland as an international tour guide.
